//---- DESCRIPTIONS ARRAY ----//
Rotorua\'s Redwood Forest has been lit up with a new nocturnal tourism experience, Redwoods Nightlights.
Deep within Fiordland National Park lies Milford Sound, New Zealandâ€™s most stunning natural attraction. With its magical combination of mountain peaks, ink-dark waters and superb dramatic forest-clad cliffs, it must be seen to be believed.
Franz Josef Glacier Guides take guests to see the very best of New Zealand\'s West Coast glaciers.
